definition: air drop/to drop supplies by air
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of

sentences.english: China's air force dropped tons of disaster relief materials into the quake-stricken area.
sentences.chinese: 空軍爲災區空投了數噸的救災物災。

sentences.english: The US and Britain airlift supplies into a Berlin blockaded by the USSR.
sentences.chinese: 美國和英國向被蘇聯封鎖的柏林地區空投物資。

sentences.english: The Hercules can also be committed for airdrops of troops or equipment and for LAPES (Low Altitude Parachute Extraction System) delivery of heavy cargoes.
sentences.chinese: 大力神飛機可以空投軍隊或者重型裝備。

sentences.english: Contact with the headquarters of the U. S. military, ensure accurate airdrop of traded goods.
sentences.chinese: 與美軍總部聯繫，確保能夠準確空投交易的物品。

sentences.english: When the vehicle reaches the preset speed, it begins to release t…
sentences.chinese: 載雷車達到預定速度後，釋放空投魚雷。

sentences.english: In addition , paratroop assaults and airdrops can move ground forces and supplies .
sentences.chinese: 傘兵攻擊和空投可以地面部隊和用品。

sentences.english: The U. N. is trying to air-drop medical supplies to that area.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國正試着將醫療物資空投到那個地區。

sentences.english: At the same 2 cases of full stacks of chain explosives would be airdropped and locations pinged on the minimap.
sentences.chinese: 同時2箱滿堆的連鎖箱子被空投到地圖指示的位置。

sentences.english: Supplies are also being dropped by air.
sentences.chinese: 飛機也正在空投補給物資。

sentences.english: Premier Wen has been anxious for airlifts to all areas.
sentences.chinese: 溫總理一直盼望空投到所有地區。

sentences.english: First the garrison lost the airstrip, which meant it could only be reinforced by parachute.
sentences.chinese: 先是守備部隊丟掉了機場跑道，這意味着要加強空投。

sentences.english: To use the artillery or air drop assets, a squad leader must request them.
sentences.chinese: 如果要使用火炮或者空投，需要小隊長申請。

sentences.english: Supplies were chuted to the snowbound troops.
sentences.chinese: 對被風雪所困的部隊空投了供給品。

sentences.english: Softlanding and buffering is an important component of the air-drop technology.
sentences.chinese: 着陸緩衝技術是空投技術的一個重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The government is trying to replenish supplies by airlifting food.
sentences.chinese: 政府正試圖通過空投食品補充供應。

sentences.english: When the vehicle reaches the preset speed, it begins to release the torpedo…
sentences.chinese: 載雷車達到預定速度後，釋放空投魚雷。
